samples.question: Can you start talking now, please?
samples.transcript: Yes. So, I am going to describe a time when I were busy. So I would say these days this my last semester in my uni. So I have to prepare a grade of documents and some materials for my uni and I really feel I am overwhelmed because this year not only I need to free finish my final dissertation in uni but also I need to prepare to go to the UK for study my master's degree. So I need to for example I need to go to visa center to finish my visa. I need to apply for the UK's universities. I do not know if you if they will give me lots of offers. So I have to maybe apply for different units in the UK at the same time. For example like Kings the University of Edinburgh or the University of Sheffield for example. And I I was unhappy in maybe last a week, but I talked to my parents and some of my close friend. I feel much better now. For example, like last week I talked one of my Chinese professors. I tell them these days I need to work on two significant things at the same time. I do not really do not know. I have no idea how to deal with them. I want to finish them perfectly. I really do not know in my list that could you give me some any ideas and that person helped me an awful lot. So I think even though I feel that that was a hard time, that was a busy time, but I still can ask someone for help. It makes me happy. Okay, I will stop you there. Thank you very much. So, we have been talking here about a time when you were busy. I would like to go on and ask you some questions related to that.
